turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Angel of the Meadow.
turn.1: What is the Angel of the Meadow?
turn.2: Angel of the Meadow The Angel of the Meadow is the name given by the media to an unidentified murder victim who was discovered in 2010 in Angel Meadow, Manchester, United Kingdom.
turn.3: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.4: Despite an extensive international investigation, the woman's identity, and that of her killer, have never been established.
turn.6: The body was discovered on 25 January 2010 at the site of a former carpark located between Angel Street, Dantzic Street and Miller Street in Manchester, England.
turn.8: The area is known as Angel Meadow and was the location of a notorious Victorian slum which Friedrich Engels notably referred to as "hell upon earth".
turn.9: What was being built upon the site of the discovery?
turn.10: At the time of the discovery, the site was being prepared for redevelopment into the new head offices for the Co-operative Group.
turn.12: A workman noticed a skull which led to the discovery of a human skeleton concealed underneath sections of blue carpet.
